name: Data Knife
description: An essential tool of any Pilot. Allows the ability to easily access any form of terminal or hack automatons or even function as a joystick to pilot vehicles as demonstrated in the late Titan Wars by Pilot Jack Cooper.

actions.name: Basic Hack
actions.detail: Hack a Terminal or any basic technology

actions.name: Advanced Hack
actions.detail: Hack a Titan or anything that may take more time or is determined to not be stored inside the Dataknifes storage.

name: Jump Kit
description:
While in pilot mode you can use the Jumpkit to 'WALLRUN', while you are '' you count as 'FLYING and can move 2 hexes for 1 point of movement. Jumping between walls counts as 1 point of movement as long as it is less than or equal to your total movement.
While wallrunning, if you have the 'PLOT OF THE PILOT' talent then you may roll your pilot dodge with advantage.
